name: CampaignMember
description: Represents the association between a campaign and a lead or a contact.
summary:
The `CampaignMember` object in Salesforce represents the relationship between an individual Lead or Contact and a specific Campaign. It tracks the participation and status of a Lead or Contact in a Campaign. Below is a summary of the attributes of the `CampaignMember` object:

1. **Id (id)**: Unique identifier for the Campaign Member record.
2. **IsDeleted (boolean)**: Indicates if the record has been deleted.
3. **CampaignId (reference)**: Reference to the associated Campaign.
4. **LeadId (reference)**: Reference to the associated Lead (if applicable).
5. **ContactId (reference)**: Reference to the associated Contact (if applicable).
6. **Status (picklist)**: Status of the Campaign Member (e.g., Sent, Responded).
7. **HasResponded (boolean)**: Indicates if the Campaign Member has responded.
8. **CreatedDate (datetime)**: Date and time when the record was created.
9. **CreatedById (reference)**: ID of the user who created the record.
10. **LastModifiedDate (datetime)**: Date and time when the record was last modified.
11. **LastModifiedById (reference)**: ID of the user who last modified the record.
12. **SystemModstamp (datetime)**: System timestamp for tracking the last update.
13. **FirstRespondedDate (date)**: Date when the Campaign Member first responded.
14. **Salutation (picklist)**: Salutation of the Campaign Member (e.g., Mr., Ms.).
15. **Name (string)**: Full name of the Campaign Member.
16. **FirstName (string)**: First name of the Campaign Member.
17. **LastName (string)**: Last name of the Campaign Member.
18. **Title (string)**: Title of the Campaign Member.
19. **Street (string)**: Street address of the Campaign Member.
20. **City (string)**: City of the Campaign Member.
21. **State (string)**: State of the Campaign Member.
22. **PostalCode (string)**: Postal code of the Campaign Member.
23. **Country (string)**: Country of the Campaign Member.
24. **Email (email)**: Email address of the Campaign Member.
25. **Phone (phone)**: Phone number of the Campaign Member.
26. **Fax (phone)**: Fax number of the Campaign Member.
27. **MobilePhone (phone)**: Mobile phone number of the Campaign Member.
28. **Description (textarea)**: Description or additional information about the Campaign Member.
29. **DoNotCall (boolean)**: Indicates if the Campaign Member should not be called.
30. **HasOptedOutOfEmail (boolean)**: Indicates if the Campaign Member has opted out of receiving emails.
31. **HasOptedOutOfFax (boolean)**: Indicates if the Campaign Member has opted out of receiving faxes.
32. **LeadSource (picklist)**: Source of the Lead.
33. **CompanyOrAccount (string)**: Company or Account associated with the Campaign Member.
34. **Type (string)**: Type of the Campaign Member (e.g., Lead or Contact).
35. **LeadOrContactId (reference)**: Reference to the associated Lead or Contact.
36. **LeadOrContactOwnerId (reference)**: ID of the owner of the associated Lead or Contact.

This object is crucial for tracking and managing campaign activities and responses, enabling effective marketing and sales efforts.
label: Campaign Member
